alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Mobile Central (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued November 16 at 2:44PM CST until November 18 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 degrees possible. * WHERE...In Alabama, Mobile Central and Baldwin Central Counties. In Florida, Escambia Inland, Santa Rosa Inland and Okaloosa Inland Counties. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...All locations to the north of the Watch area will also likely freeze late Thursday night and early Friday morning, but these locations have already had a widespread freeze earlier in the fall and a Watch will not be issued there as Freeze products are only issued for the initial freeze of the year. PRECAUTIONARY PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing. &&
